subject: Re: Hearing Australia digital marketing catalogue
preview: +15mins added to the existing ticket in Momentum tracker.

full_threads.body: +15mins added to the existing ticket in Momentum tracker.

Hi Melinda,

Confirming the Hearing Australia digital marketing catalogue changes were pushed live at 10:55 am, you can see them here: https://phonakmarketing.com.au/

Please review and let us know of any further changes.

action.text: Manuel Lito Manceli assigned to Chris Paradowski

full_threads.body:
@chris @glen all good now.

https://phonakmarketing.com.au/

Task time 10min backup live site and push staging to live.
@manuel please help us to push the staging to the live site.

action.text: Glen Tenorio assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli

full_threads.body: @rica, we can go live of the staging URL on Monday 15/04/24. Thanks!

Hi Melinda, 

Confirming the requested changes have been made to on a staging server. You can see the updates here: https://stg-phonakmarketing-stg.kinsta.cloud/hearing-australia/

We have also completed the updates for Sky Lumity, these were completed on both the live and staging servers to ensure they aren't missed during the push to live. You can see these updates here: https://phonakmarketing.com.au/phonak-sky-lumity/

Please review and let us know of any further changes.

Hi @glen, looking great!

Some minor updates:

1. on page: https://stg-phonakmarketing-stg.kinsta.cloud/marketing-catalogue/ the blue overlay doesn't appear to be on brand. Can we please use a black/grey that is not completely opaque? screenshot added.

2. on page: https://stg-phonakmarketing-stg.kinsta.cloud/hearing-australia/roger/ change the hero image to match the background found on: https://stg-phonakmarketing-stg.kinsta.cloud/roger/


+20 minutes to check updates.

https://stg-phonakmarketing-stg.kinsta.cloud/hearing-australia/

please check @chris done updating the page and the subpages.

done updating the Phonak Sky Platform comparison tile as well

3 hours
Hi @glen, can you please assist me with the below ticket? Manuel has set up a staging server already.

Hi Chris,

Can you please update the Phonak Sky Platform comparison with the attached doc.

Please update in both the Phonak digital marketing catalogue in the Sky Lumity tile, under professional brochures (link below)

https://phonakmarketing.com.au/phonak-sky-lumity/

Please use the updated version when copying over to the Hearing Australia digital marketing catalogue.

Regards,

Melinda

Sorry, I should have included it on my brief.

Hi Melinda, 

Sure thing. Can you please confirm you are referring this particular page on the Phonak Marketing website:https://phonakmarketing.com.au/hearing-australia/?

We'll set up a staging server and share the updates with you once complete.

Hi all,

Could I please request for the Hearing Australia digital marketing catalogue to be updated with the following items:

Update background image on home page to beach big splasher image.

Please restructure the home page tiles to the below:

  • Lumity
  • Paradise
  • Marvel
  • Roger

Each of the above home page tiles are to then host the below:

  • Lumity
  • Audéo Lumity
  • Sky Lumity
  • CROS Lumity
    • Please replicate each of these tiles from the Phonak digital marketing catalogue
    • Please update Lumity hosting tile with Ayres Rock image


  • Paradise
  • Audéo Paradise
  • Naida Paradise
  • CROS Paradise
    • Please add these tiles to the main page Paradise tile
    • Please update the name of the CROS P tile to CROS Paradise
    • Please update Paradise hosting tile with Paradise lady currently used on home page
  • Marvel
  • Naida Marvel
  • Sky Marvel
    • Please delete Bolero Marvel but keep Naida Marvel and Sky Marvel
    • Please add these tiles to the main page Marvel tile
    • Please use current Marvel tile image as is.



  • Roger
    • Please replicate the Roger tile from the Phonak digital marketing catalogue



Could I please have this to go live 9am Monday 15th April.

Could I also please have a closed link so I can review the updates prior to this date?

Regards,

Melinda


Melinda O'Brien
Phonak Marketing Manager
